page.title: 04FARM MACHINERY
page.content: There are about{26 farms}in Lismore, with at least one{tractor}per farm. They are mostly{Massey Ferguson,}but there are{2 David Brown}and{3 Zeta. Ploughs are{Begg, Ransome}and{David {Brown. { Hay cutters}are mostly finger-bar reapers. There are{4 rotary-powered {reapers. { Hay turners}are of all kinds, from conversions from horse-drawn turners to modern{Hay Bob. There are{6 square hay balers.One {round baler,}new in 1984, is owned by a co-op of three and used for{silage {in plastic bags. There is one large{Atkinson {limespreader.}There are some 3 point linkage mounted{spreaders}for fertiliser. There are two flail-type{dung {spreaders}and some rear- action types.
